questions.question: Which example best shows structures that make up the digestive system in the human body?
Which system of the human body provides protection to most of the major organs?
Which characteristic do single-celled organisms and multicellular organisms have in common?

choices.answer: Both have cells w/ specialized functions 4 each lifeprocess
Both perform all life processes within one cell.
Both have a way to get rid of waste materials.
Both are able to make food from sunlight.

questions.question: Which statement best describes a bacterial cell?

choices.answer: It contains more than one cell.
It is part of a larger organism.
It contains different kinds of cells.

questions.question: Which is a function of the cardiovascular system?

choices.answer: to move water throughout the body
to provide structural support for the body
to eliminate waste from the body
to transport gases throughout the body

questions.question: Why do multicellular organisms need transport systems?Most cells that....

choices.answer: are not able to exchange gases with the outside environment.
are unable to grow and survive in their environment.
need food from sources outside their environment.
require more energy to survive than single-celled organisms
